meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of great surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The magician's tricks were astonishing to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was astonishingly beautiful.
meanings.sent3: It was astonishing to see a cat riding a skateboard.
meanings.sent4: The speed at which the car raced down the track was astonishing.
meanings.sent5: The view from the mountaintop was astonishingly breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The sudden plot twist in the movie was astonishing.
meanings.sent2: Her talent for painting was astonishingly good.
meanings.sent3: It was astonishing how quickly the cake disappeared at the party.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's performance was astonishing, breaking all records.
meanings.sent5: The amount of stars visible in the clear night sky was astonishingly vast.
